moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d4: Somewhat old-fashioned, but it does open lines quickly. In this case, it is Black who exploits this!
moves.3... exd4 4. Nxd4 Nf6: The usual development... Black has a slight initiative.
moves.7. exd5 Ne5: White is up a Pawn. He needs to consolidate his position and get his King to safety.
